items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: Jarvis Virtual Assistant is a browser-based voice assistant built using JavaScript and the Web Speech API. It listens to user voice commands and performs simple tasks like telling the time, greeting the user, or opening websites like Google and YouTube. This lightweight assistant offers an interactive and fun way to explore speech recognition.

This lightweight assistant offers an interactive and fun way to explore speech recognition.
